Description: Limestone ostracon: on recto and verso respectively ten and two lines of a business text recording a list of goods belonging to Prahotep which are in the hands of Neferhotep. A second column of three lines of text on the recto refer to some work done on a coffin.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: J. J. Černy and A.H. Gardiner, ‘Hieratic Ostraca’ (Oxford 1957), p. 16 and pl. LVII, 1; S. Allam, 'Hieratische Ostraka und Papyri aus der Ramessidenzeit' (Tubingen, 1973), no. 220, pp. 220—21; J.J. Janssen, 'Commodity Prices from the Ramessid Period' (Leiden, 1975), p. 72.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136402) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136402)
